content.rendered:
Directed by Damien Leone

Written by Damien Leone

Star David Howard Thornton(Art the Clown). Jenna Kanell(Tara Heyes). Lauren LaVera(Sienna). Catherine Corcoran(Dawn). Samantha Scaffidi(Victoria Heyes). Kailey Hyman(Brooke). Katie Maguire(Monica Brown). Felissa Rose(Ms. Principe). Casey Hartnett(Allie). Griffin Santopietro(Eric). Jackie Adragna(Nightclub Bartender). Tamara Glynn(Shopping Mother). Chris Jericho(Burke). Elliott Fullam(Jonathan). Sarah Voigt(Barbara). Amelie McLain(The Little Pale Girl). Georgia MacPhail(Pale girl in the vanity). Charlie McElveen(Jeff). Michael Leavy(Club Announcer). Rachel Keefe(Obnoxious Female Teenager 1). Sarah Grace Sanders(Trick or Treat Little Girl’s Mom). Devon Roth(Stephanie). Rick Styczynski(Selfie Guy). Leah Voysey(TV Host / Nurse). Steven Della Salla(Police Officer #2). Jason Leavy(Police Officer #1). Phil Falcone(TV Executive). Amy Russ(Allie’s Mom). Marcus Slabine(Nightclub Bartender). Jamie Root(Obnoxious Female Teenager 2). Mark Langston(Mr. Whalen). Gilbrando Acevedo(Truant Officer / Nightclub Punk Rocker). Cory DuVal(Coroner). Owen Myre(Sean). Johnath Davis(Costume Shop Owner (as Johnathan Davis)). Ryan James(Bow Tie Guy). Thomas Rickman(The Pilot). Elizabeth Piper S.(Vampire / Janice Halloween Dancer). Wesley Holloway(TV Commercial Kid). Briana Calcagno(Trick or Treat Mom). Nick Ford(Nightclub Partygoer). Michelle Santiago(Waitress). Loren W. Lepre(The DJ). Nedim Jahic(Travis Bryant). Matthew Hammond(Nightclub Hotdog). Olga Turka(Nightclub Partygoer). Thomas Smith(Middle Aged Man). Steven Kiseleski(Nightclub Zombie). Ross Caudill Jr.(Nightclub Devil). Robert Privitera(Obnoxious Male Teenager). Reid Richards(Shopping Mother’s Son). Johnny Ferri(Nightclub Gladiator). Joshua Kirpach(Nightclub Vampire). Sheri Fairchild(Bar Patron). Marisa Bertani(News Anchor). Geordie McGillivray(Clown Cafe Guest). Craig Loydgren(Nightclub Party Goer). Joshua Anderson(Nightclub Partygoer). Mick Gaughan(Night Club Bouncer). Ryan Denning(Nightclub Party Goer 2). Jonathan A. Streetzel(Nightclub Black-Cloaked Demon). Craig Sapenoff(Nightclub Second Party Demon). Rob Gabriele(Clown Cafe Guest). Sarah Brill(Convenient Store Shopper 2). Miche Brill(Convenient Store Shopper 1). Curtis J. Watson(Dean Russell). Brian Slagel(Clown Cafe Guest). Ava O’Donnell(Trick or Treat Little Girl). Brianna Loydgren(Nightclub Partygoer). Artemis Seay(Nightclub Partygoer). Kate Gabriele(Clown Cafe Guest). Maryann Ahadian(Nightclub Partygoer). Austin Belsky(Clown Cafe Guest). Amber Curtis(Clown Cafe Guest). Lonnie Delon(Nightclub Partygoer). Joan Edwards(Elementary School Teacher). Sarah Hampton(Nightclub Partygoer). Jeff Harris(Clown Cafe Guest). Tamara Kostadinova(Nightclub Partygoer). Rachael Kuhr(Nightclub Partygoer). Sam Macaluso(Clown Cafe Guest). Eliza Madore(Clown Cafe Guest). Kerry McGuire(Clown Cafe Guest). John O’Malley(Clown Cafe Guest). Diego Santos(Nightclub Partygoer). Elizabeth Piper Schlit(Nightclub Partygoer). Alyssa Scudero(Nightclub Partygoer). Jeff Zemito(Clown Cafe Guest). Scott Klausen(Costume Store Customer (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Cairo Ben Amen II. Joshua Anderson. Steven Barton. Larry Bilello. Steven Caruso. Stephen Conca. Steven Della Salla. Lisa Falcone. Phil Falcone. Nick Ford. Hank Greenberg. Matthew Hammond. Maisy Kay. Joshua Kirpach. Steven Kiseleski. Jason Leavy. Michael Leavy. Marcus J. McGill. Michelle Santiago. Thomas Smith. George Steuber

Production Dark Age Cinema. Fuzz on the Lens Productions
